question.xref: DES s8, DES s10, HC r171
question.text: At this blind junction you must stop

explanation.text: The ‘stop’ sign has been put here because there is a poor view into the main road. You must stop because it will not be possible to assess the situation on the move, however slowly you are travelling.

answer.text: behind the line, then edge forward to see clearly
beyond the line at a point where you can see clearly
only if there is traffic on the main road
only if you are turning to the right
